name: Barry Platypus
description:
Barry Platypus was going to meet up with his friends to play some epic games, but his car broke. This left him with three options: call a taxi, wait for a tow truck to bring his car into the shop, or go through the walking path, which hasn't been renovated in over 419 years. The walking path is extremely dangerous, but that will not stop an epic gamer.

Controls:

WASD

Version:

1.0 (3/18/2020) - Launch Day 

the game literally takes 50 seconds to finish
